member.name: T:GASS.OpenCL.OpenGL.OpenCLGLDriver
member.summary: This class provides the driver interface for OpenGL interoperability with OpenCL standard.

member.name: T:GASS.OpenCL.OpenCLDriver
member.summary: This class provides the driver interface to OpenCL functions.

member.name: T:GASS.Types.SizeT
member.summary:
Used to represent a platform dependent sized variable. On 32 bit platforms it is 4 bytes wide (int, uint), on 64 bit it is 8 bytes wide (long, ulong).
This class maps to the C/C++ native size_t data type.

member.name: M:GASS.Types.SizeT.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance based on the given value.

member.summary: Creates a new instance based on the given value.

member.name: M:GASS.Types.SizeT.#ctor(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Creates a new instance based on the given value.

member.name: M:GASS.Types.SizeT.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance or null.
member.returns: true if obj is an instance of System.IntPtr and equals the value of this instance; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Converts the numeric value of the current object to its equivalent string representation.
member.returns: The string representation of the value of this instance.
